statements: SELECT * FROM crop_data WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, yield_kg FROM crop_data WHERE sale_price > 50;
SELECT crop_name, sale_price FROM crop_data ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_data WHERE yield_kg BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT crop_id, crop_name, yield_kg, sale_price FROM crop_data WHERE crop_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT crop_name, yield_kg, sale_price FROM crop_data WHERE yield_kg > 1000 ORDER BY sale_price DESC
SELECT * FROM crop_data WHERE crop_id = 5
SELECT crop_name, SUM(yield_kg) AS total_yield FROM crop_data GROUP BY crop_name
SELECT AVG(sale_price) AS average_sale_price FROM crop_data WHERE crop_name LIKE 'Wheat%'
SELECT DISTINCT crop_name FROM crop_data
SELECT * FROM crop_yields;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yields WHERE yield_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount < 500 ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT id, crop_name, yield_date FROM crop_yields WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato';
SELECT * FROM crop_yields WHERE yield_amount > 100 ORDER BY yield_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, SUM(yield_amount) AS total_yield FROM crop_yields GROUP BY crop_name;
SELECT crop_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_name FROM crop_yields WHERE yield_amount < 50;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data ORDER BY crop_id DESC, yield_kg ASC;
SELECT sale_price, sale_date FROM crop_yield_data WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT analysis_id, profit FROM financial_analysis WHERE total_revenue > total_cost;
SELECT crop_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_sales FROM crop_sales GROUP BY crop_id;
SELECT * FROM crop_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT crop_id, yield_kg, sale_price, sale_date FROM crop_yield_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM crop_sales WHERE sold_quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT crop_id, total_revenue, profit, analysis_date FROM financial_analysis WHERE total_revenue > total_cost ORDER BY total_revenue DESC, analysis_date ASC;
SELECT crop_id, SUM(yield_kg) AS total_yield FROM crop_yield_data GROUP BY crop_id ORDER BY total_yield DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data JOIN crop_sales ON crop_yield_data.crop_id = crop_sales.crop_id WHERE crop_id = 1 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM YieldData
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM YieldData WHERE yield_amount > 100
SELECT date_recorded, crop_name FROM YieldData ORDER BY date_recorded DESC
SELECT SUM(yield_amount) AS total_yield FROM YieldData
SELECT * FROM FinancialData WHERE transaction_type='sale'
SELECT * FROM YieldData ORDER BY date_recorded DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM YieldData WHERE yield_amount > 100 ORDER BY yield_amount DESC;
SELECT crop_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT crop_name, revenue, month_year FROM RevenueData WHERE revenue > 50000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT crop_name, transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM FinancialData WHERE transaction_type = 'Expense' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yield_data WHERE yield_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT id, crop_name, yield_amount, yield_date FROM crop_yield_data WHERE yield_amount > 1000 ORDER BY yield_amount DESC;
SELECT crop_name, sum(yield_amount) as total_yield FROM crop_yield_data GROUP BY crop_name;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-08-31';
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data ORDER BY yield_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yield_data WHERE yield_amount > 1000 ORDER BY yield_amount DESC;
SELECT crop_name, SUM(yield_amount) AS total_yield FROM crop_yield_data GROUP BY crop_name;
SELECT crop_name, quantity_sold, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT crop_name, variety_name, planting_date FROM crop_varieties WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato';
